name: Uberfriends
description:
You are stranded in space, try and save as many of your uber friends as possible from the evil squares and try to get them to the mothership. But watch out for astroids that leave you and your friends spinning in space endlessly.

Instructions: 

Use wasd or arrow keys to move. You will be warned when a astroid is approaching, if you get hit by an astroid you instantly die. Collect your friends to size up, and watch out for squares because if you hit them, you will lose a friend. If you have no friends and you get hit you die. Try and get the most amount of friends to the mothership as possible.
